body_html:
I have the same problem too. I have done all the followings, but still does not work......

Installed Python 3.5.3
Installed CUDA 8.0
Installed cuDNN v5.1 (copied the cudnn64_5.dll into CUDA/bin)
Have msvcp140.dll in both system32 and sysWOW64
Add the CUDA/bin path into %PATH%
Both dll files can be located using "where" in command prompt

What do I miss?

body:
I have the same problem too. I have done all the followings, but still does not work......

Installed Python 3.5.3
